Name: autoimmune gastritis
Definition: An autoimmune disease of gastrointestinal tract that is located_in the stomach.

Name: stomach cancer
Definition: A gastrointestinal system cancer that is located_in the stomach.
Synonym: malignant tumor of lesser curve of stomach

Name: obsolete coxsackie myocarditis
Definition: A coxsackie carditis that results_in inflammation located_in myocardium
Synonym: malignant tumor of lesser curve of stomach

Name: functional gastric disease
Definition: A peripheral nervous system disease that involves an acute loss of function of the lumbar plexus

Name: Dieulafoy lesion
Definition: A pervasive developmental disease that is characterized by normal early growth and development followed by a slowing of development
Synonym: dieulafoy lesion (hemorrhagic) of stomach and duodenum

Name: pylorospasm
Definition: A pervasive developmental disease that is characterized by normal early growth and development followed by a slowing of development
Synonym: dieulafoy lesion (hemorrhagic) of stomach and duodenum

Name: obsolete interstitial emphysema and related conditions of newborn
Definition: A pervasive developmental disease that is characterized by normal early growth and development followed by a slowing of development
Synonym: dieulafoy lesion (hemorrhagic) of stomach and duodenum

Name: cascade stomach
Definition: A dementia that is characterized by the development of abnormal proteinaceous (alpha-synuclein) cytoplasmic inclusions
Synonym: Hourglass stricture or stenosis of stomach

Name: hiatus hernia
Definition: A pyloric stenosis characterized by the enlargement of the muscle surrounding the pylorus

Name: obsolete Congenital or acquired abnormality of vulva
Definition: A pyloric stenosis characterized by the enlargement of the muscle surrounding the pylorus

Name: obsolete genitourinary cancer
Definition: An organ system cancer located_in the genitourinary system that is characterized by uncontrolled cellular proliferation in reproductive and urinary organs.

Name: obsolete disorder of optic chiasm associated with inflammatory disorder
Definition: An organ system cancer located_in the genitourinary system that is characterized by uncontrolled cellular proliferation in reproductive and urinary organs.

Name: gastric hemangioma
Definition: A glycogen storage disease that has_material_basis_in deficiency of the glucose-6-phosphatase enzyme which impairs the ability of the liver to produce free glucose from glycogen and from gluconeogenesis and is characterized by accumulation of glycogen and fat in the liver and kidneys

Name: gastric outlet obstruction
Definition: A biliary tract cancer that is located_in the gallbladder.

Name: obsolete multiple endocrine neoplasia
Definition: A biliary tract cancer that is located_in the gallbladder.

Name: gastric dilatation
Definition: A spinal cord disease that is characterized by inflammation of the white matter or gray matter of the spinal cord.

Name: obsolete Human T-lymphotropic virus 1 infectious disease
Definition: A viral infectious disease that results in increased proliferation of affected CD4 lymphocytes

Name: gastritis
Definition: A stomach disease that is an inflammation of the lining of the stomach.

Name: stomach diverticulosis
Definition: An autoimmune disease of the nervous system that has_material_basis_in antibodies to acetylcholine receptors at the neuromuscular junction

Name: Cronkhite-Canada syndrome
Definition: A Retroviridae infectious disease that results_in infection in animals and humans
